about_the_game:
GET BUILDING. GET CREATIVE.



Become a master model maker and bring out your creativity in the Complete Edition of this beloved simulation game, now including all DLC.

Cut out, assemble, paint, and then customize your models! Build planes, tanks, ships, figures, and so much more. Sell your creations for-profit to expand your toolkit. Create stunning and epic scale models for the world to see.

Experience the Complete Edition

  • Base Game: Dive into the rich and immersive world of model building. Follow in the footsteps of grandfather Stan, unlocking secrets of the past, taking on commissions, and competing in challenges to become a master modelling craftsman.
  • Military Pack DLC: Assemble iconic military vehicles, the F14 Fighter Plane, A10 Thunderbolt Plane, and Sherman Tank.
  • Cars Pack DLC: Rev up your creativity with the Beach Buggy, Supercar, and Classic Race Car.
  • Frostpunk DLC: Embrace the challenge of the great frost with models inspired by the Frostpunk game, including the Dreadnought, Automaton, and Generator.
  • Expansion Pack No.1: Enjoy the M26 Pershing Tank, PT-109 Boat, Hurricane Fighter Plane, and Astrocat Figurine
  • The Invincible Helmet DLC: Step into a retro-future adventure with the iconic helmet from The Invincible.
  • Titan-Forge DLCs No.1 & No.2: Expand your fantasy figurine collection with the Halfling Male Rogue, Half-Orc Female Barbarian, Elf Male Wizard Miniature, and Tiefling Female Warlock Miniature.
  • Aether DLC: Experience the future of transportation with the e-motorbike Aether, a visionary creation by industrial designer Lin Yu Cheng.



Go on a fascinating journey in the footsteps of grandfather Stan and his achievements, unlocking secrets of the past, take on commission and competitions as you become the master modelling craftsman.



There's plenty to choose from in terms of what you can assemble… and once you are done, there's a ton more to unlock. Expect dozens of hours of fun and much more in post-release updates.



Choose the model that you want to create, feel the satisfaction of snipping out the model parts, step by step build your model, and apply finishing touches, so it is ready for painting.



You have a wide variety of tools at your disposal - everything you need to assemble your impressive models and make them shine.- Unlock new tools to help with precision work and finishes. You will feel like a pro in no time.



Now it’s time to get creative! You can take the serious route and stick to the brief, or why not make the model your own and pimp it up. With plenty of paint to choose from, use the airbrush tool, or apply with fine detail and top it off with some impressive decals. Your creativity is the limit.



Once your model is complete, that is not the end! You can set a scene in PhotoBooth mode and arrange your models onto different backgrounds, add cool effects and make them look even better! Share your work directly from the game to your Social Media channels and show it to others.
detailed_description:
WE VALUE YOUR OPINION!

"Great game to play while ignoring the real pile of shame on my mini workbench." - Nien Nunb

"Sat down to paint a nice golden dragon. When I was done my wife was gone. 10/10" - ☭✦SovietGondor✦☭

"A very relaxing game, perfect for de-stressing after a tough day." - Rufus

"This game is worth your time, make no mistake, especially at this price." - Kell's Bells

"It's relaxing, it's satisfying.... it's a virtual hobby, but it's FUN." - Dre2Dee2

"I’m only a few hours in, but Model Builder is already one of my favorite purchases in a very long time." - thelefthorse

"Very nice game which brings me back to doing models when I was young. Highly Recommended." - Born Canadian

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060S / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

movies.name: Model Build Get Creative Teaser Trailer
Model Builder x Titan Forge - Dwarf Figure

name: Model Builder: Complete Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit CPU: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD /NVMe strongly recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060S / AMD Radeon RX 5700, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Modern SSD/NVMe storage recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]

reviews:
“Model Builder, thanks to its handy operating system, excellently reproduces the modeling process from assembly and coloring to stickers addition, and its user-friendly prompts make it easier for players to learn it.”
Gamersky

“Model Builder is time-consuming, rather tedious, sometimes frustrating, but also perversely addictive and relaxing.”
CD-Action

“Model Builder’s powerful suite of building and painting tools enable calming and creative game play that makes a potentially tricky hobby very accessible.”
Finger Guns
short_description: Become a master model maker in the Complete Edition of this beloved crafting simulator, featuring all DLCs. Assemble, customize and display your creations, whether you’re a veteran or a novice. Get building, and get creative!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Italian, French, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
